|brand = USRobotics |model = USR8200 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/10/2011 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/US_Robotics_USR8200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = VPN Router Firewall, NAS, router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = KN140172 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP422;FWIXP422AB; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = 266 <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;E28F128-J3A150; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Mosel Vitelic;V54C3256164VBLT7; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Altima;AC101L;AC101LKQT, TD0421 P11, 720842A; |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6060;88E6060-RCJ, FB79501.2, 0328 B0P, Taiwan; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:C0:49
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.4.19;OpenRG;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, 1394a (Firewire), |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.33 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header,, populated,, |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup |addchip = PCI USB 2.0 4-Port Host Controller;VIA;VT6202;VT6202, 0325CD, 23A5019200;1; ,,, PCI 1394a Integrated Host Controller;VIA;VT6307;VT6307S, 0324CD, 2HA1006436;1; ,,, RS-232 Driver Receiver;Sipex;SP3220;SP3220ECA-0416;1; ,,, 4-bit Real Time Clock;Epson;RTC7301;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt,
|availability = EoL |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 06/2003 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 738168034963 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0000A1EES |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N:KN140172" is silkscreened on the board in ''RN'''s image shown below.. :and on the board shown on the ''OpenWrt'' wiki page.
==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/us.robotics/usr8200 ''US Robotics 8200'' on the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :CPU: [[Intel XScale]] IXP422 (FWIXP422AB) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/USRobotics_USR8200 On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki]
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=66875 ''Question: USR-8200 support?'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums]
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/24631-uusr8200 Review on '''SmallNetBuilder''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRT |techdata = |wikipage = https://wiki.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/USRobotics_USR8200 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = wip, redboot must be installed |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = [https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/USR8200 see wiki] }} Please insert instructions here
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/us.robotics/usr8200 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/usrobotics/usrobotics_usr8200_1 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ixp4xx |subtarget = generic |arch = armeb_xscale |support_started_version = WIP |current_supported_version = snapshot |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
